segments.text: I can't take my eyes off that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so high up, stretching to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is angled, and the stool's legs are definitely splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I am genuinely afraid he's going to fall backwards at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the crash, the cookies scattering everywhere, maybe a broken plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like such a painful fall if he loses his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is wet from the overflowing sink; that's an added danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still oblivious, humming to herself perhaps.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to tell her what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is making me quite anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout a warning to the boy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so focused on those cookies, completely unaware of the peril he's in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
